name: eyezon
author: eyezon

sections.description:
You get a unique opportunity to have a live conversation with your online customers, answer all their questions, resolve issues, help them make a purchase decision, and get unique first-hand insights.

eyezon is a customer-driven, touch point agnostic solution, that helps you create a truly accessible, unique shopping experience and boost conversions. You can show your online customers your product live directly from your site, online and offline banners, social media, and any ad. When a customer clicks the “see live” button, link, or scans a QR code, they join a 1-1 live stream with your brand expert or best sales rep and get a personalized and qualified consultation.

https://vimeo.com/704090079

eyezon brings back human connection to online shopping.

How does eyezon work:

  • A customer clicks the “see live” button on your website
  • Immediately, the eyezon widget where the stream request was sent appears on the page.
  • A streamer gets the request in their app, accepts it, and sends the customer a link to join the stream in the widget.
  • The customer joins the stream and the real sales magic begins.
  • Instead of endless impersonal texting, you will be able to contact your customer directly via streaming and easily resolve all issues in a live conversation. And most importantly: no more returns, because your customer will see the product in person before placing the online order.
  • Integrating eyezon is much easier than creating your online store. But we’ll still take care of all the work to set up the service and help you get it up and running easily. We recommend using Woocommerce plugin for your store to access all eyezon features.

eyezon is made up of 3 digital elements that help you level up your business and increase conversions:

  1. The widget for customers, that opens on your website page and directly connects customers with your salesperson – the product streamer.
  2. The app for streamers, where streamers can accept requests, host streams, and communicate with customers.
  3. The business account, where you can set and customize buttons, add streamers, and manage the streaming strategy and analytics.

Why eyezon?

We put your online customers first and work to make their shopping experience as intuitive and effective as possible. So we provide a wide range of features and solutions that will simplify the purchasing process at every step of the shopper journey:
– add to cart and multicart features, which allow your customers to add several products to their cart during the stream
– review the cart feature, which allows customers to see the product in their cart live before placing an order
– co-op feature, which lets your customers invite friends & family to the stream to get advice and make a weighted purchase decision
– captions feature, which makes online shopping accessible for hearing-impaired customers
– two-way stream, which allows your customers to turn their cameras on during the stream and get more personalized assistance.

eyezon has a wide range native features that allows your customers to create their own purchase journey by inviting their friends & family to join the stream, reviewing the cart before making a purchase, scheduling a stream appointment, and more.
And you can increase your conversions, get unique, first-hand shopping insights directly from your customers and create more relevant shopping offers.

We are also reimagining advertising campaigns of all kinds with our eyezon 360 solution. Your store can be wherever your customers are, and you can directly connect with them from any type of ad to deliver a personalized consultation about the product.

And if you don’t have your own offline infrastructure – that’s fine. Just choose eyezon showrooms and we will provide you with an equipped space, all the necessary technology for streaming, and we will also train your sales personnel according to your sales scripts.

Check out our site, news and blog to get more information about live video shopping with eyezon and feel free to contact us. We are always happy to talk.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for eyezon
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select eyezon.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download eyezon.zip
  2. Extract the eyezon directory to your computer
  3. Upload the eyezon directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
